from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, max, coalesce, trunc
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql import functions as F


# Tworzenie sesji Spark
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("AzureSynapseMigration").getOrCreate()

# Parametry dla warstwy Bronze (ADLS Gen2)
bronze_bucket_name = "abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/"
bronze_prefix = "Erp/"
file_name = "inventory_wholesaler_history_details"

# Parametry dla warstwy Silver (ADLS Gen2)
silver_bucket_name = "abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/"
silver_prefix = "f_wh_data/"

silver_path = f"{silver_bucket_name}/{silver_prefix}"

# Ścieżki do plików Parquet w ADLS Gen2
path = f"{bronze_bucket_name}{bronze_prefix}{file_name}"
path_customers =  f"{silver_bucket_name}d_customers"

# Załaduj dane z ADLS (tabela inventory_wholesaler_history_details)
bronze_df = spark.read.parquet(path)
customers_df = spark.read.parquet(path_customers)

# Wykonaj JOIN na obu DataFrame'ach na podstawie customer_id

bronze_df=bronze_df.join(customers_df,"customer_id")

latest_bronze_df = bronze_df.withColumn("max_order_date", F.max("update_date").over(Window.partitionBy("product_id", "customer_id","update_date"))).filter(F.col("update_date") == F.col("max_order_date"))

new_bronze_df = latest_bronze_df.select(
    "product_id",
    "country_id", 
    "transaction_date", 
    "unit_price", 
    "whrs_sell_in_quantity",
    "whrs_open_quantity",  # Poprawiona nazwa
    "whrs_end_quantity"
)

new_bronze_df = new_bronze_df.withColumn(
    "transaction_date", trunc("transaction_date","month"))

aggregated_bronze_df = new_bronze_df.groupBy("product_id", "country_id", "transaction_date").agg(
                                    # Summing quantity, discount, and amount
                                     F.sum("whrs_sell_in_quantity").alias("whrs_sell_in_quantity"),
                                     F.sum("whrs_open_quantity").alias("whrs_open_quantity"),
                                     F.sum("whrs_end_quantity").alias("whrs_end_quantity"),
                                     F.round(F.sum(F.col("whrs_sell_in_quantity") * F.col("unit_price")),2).alias("whrs_sell_in_amount"),
                                     F.round(F.sum(F.col("whrs_open_quantity") * F.col("unit_price")),2).alias("whrs_open_amount"),
                                     F.round(F.sum(F.col("whrs_end_quantity") * F.col("unit_price")),2).alias("whrs_end_amount"),
                                     F.round((F.sum(F.col("whrs_sell_in_quantity") * F.col("unit_price")) / F.sum("whrs_sell_in_quantity")),2).alias("unit_price"))



# Sprawdzenie, czy tabela Silver już istnieje
try:
    silver_df = spark.read.parquet(silver_path)
    silver_exists = True
except:
    silver_exists = False


# Jeśli tabela Silver istnieje, wykonaj operację "MERGE" na podstawie DataFrame
if silver_exists:
    # Załaduj dane z tabeli Silver
    silver_df = spark.read.parquet(silver_path)
    
    # Połącz dane Silver z nowymi danymi (na podstawie order_id, customer_id, product_id)
    merged_df = silver_df.alias("silver").join(
        aggregated_bronze_df.alias("new_pod"),
        (F.col("silver.product_id") == F.col("new_pod.product_id")) & 
        (F.col("silver.country_id") == F.col("new_pod.country_id")) & 
        (F.col("silver.transaction_date") == F.col("new_pod.transaction_date")),
        how="outer"
    )

    # Wybór kolumn, które mają zostać zaktualizowane lub dodane
    final_df = merged_df.select(
        F.coalesce("new_pod.product_id", "silver.product_id").alias("product_id"),
        F.coalesce("new_pod.country_id", "silver.country_id").alias("country_id"),
        F.coalesce("new_pod.transaction_date", "silver.transaction_date").alias("transaction_date"),
        
        F.coalesce("new_pod.whrs_sell_in_quantity", "silver.whrs_sell_in_quantity").alias("whrs_sell_in_quantity"),
        F.coalesce("new_pod.whrs_open_quantity", "silver.whrs_open_quantity").alias("whrs_open_quantity"),
        F.coalesce("new_pod.whrs_end_quantity", "silver.whrs_end_quantity").alias("whrs_end_quantity"),
        
        F.coalesce("new_pod.whrs_sell_in_amount", "silver.whrs_sell_in_amount").alias("whrs_sell_in_amount"),
        F.coalesce("new_pod.whrs_open_amount", "silver.whrs_open_amount").alias("whrs_open_amount"),
        F.coalesce("new_pod.whrs_end_amount", "silver.whrs_end_amount").alias("whrs_end_amount"),
        F.coalesce("new_pod.unit_price", "silver.unit_price").alias("unit_price")
        )
    # Display or save the resulting DataFrame
    # Zapisanie zaktualizowanego DataFrame do warstwy Silver
    final_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(silver_path)

else:
    aggregated_bronze_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(silver_path)

# Zakończenie
print("Inkrementalne ładowanie zakończone!")
